20110127014548.000|20110127014550.000|CC1|>>> TOYOTA MOTOR PLANS TO RECALL
20110127014550.000|20110127014553.000|CC1|NEARLY 1.7 MILLION VEHICLES IN  
20110127014553.000|20110127014555.000|CC1|JAPAN AND OVERSEAS.             
20110127014555.000|20110127014556.000|CC1|THE PROBLEMS INCLUDE A FAULTY   
20110127014556.000|20110127014558.000|CC1|FUEL PIPE.

20110127014600.000|20110127014602.000|CC1|TRANSPORT MINISTER ON WEDNESDAY 
20110127014602.000|20110127014604.000|CC1|THAT 16 MODELS WILL BE RECALLED 
20110127014604.000|20110127014605.000|CC1|IN JAPAN.                       
20110127014605.000|20110127014608.000|CC1|THEY INCLUDE THE NOAH, BOXIS,   
20110127014608.000|20110127014610.000|CC1|ISIS, AND WISH.                 
20110127014610.000|20110127014611.000|CC1|MORE THAN 1.2 MILLION UNITS THAT
20110127014611.000|20110127014613.000|CC1|WERE MADE BETWEEN MAY 2000 AND  
20110127014613.000|20110127014614.000|CC1|OCTOBER 2008 WILL BE RECALLED.  
20110127014614.000|20110127014616.000|CC1|OVERSEAS SIX MODELS, INCLUDING  
20110127014616.000|20110127014618.000|CC1|THE AVENSIS, WILL BE RECALLED   
20110127014618.000|20110127014621.000|CC1|AND THEY WILL AMOUNT TO OVER    
20110127014621.000|20110127014623.000|CC1|420,000 CARS.                   
20110127014623.000|20110127014625.000|CC1|TOYOTA'S REPORT TO THE MINISTRY 
20110127014625.000|20110127014626.000|CC1|SHOWS ONE FACTOR FOR THE RECALL 
20110127014626.000|20110127014628.000|CC1|IS THE ENGINE'S FUEL PIPE IS    
20110127014628.000|20110127014629.000|CC1|THINNER THAN REQUIRED.          
20110127014629.000|20110127014631.000|CC1|THIS MAY CAUSE CRACKS AND RESULT
20110127014631.000|20110127014633.000|CC1|IN GASOLINE LEAKAGE.            
20110127014633.000|20110127014635.000|CC1|IT WILL START REPLACING THE     
20110127014635.000|20110127014637.000|CC1|DEFECTIVE PARTS FOR FREE        
20110127014637.000|20110127014638.000|CC1|STARTING ON THURSDAY.
